allow: Bash(python3 --version 2>/dev/null || python --version 2>/dev/null; pip3 show pandas 2>/dev/null | head -2)
Bash(python3 -c "import pandas; import numpy; print\('pandas', pandas.__version__, 'numpy', numpy.__version__\)" 2>&1)
Bash(python3 -m pip install pandas numpy --quiet 2>&1 | tail -3)
Bash(sudo apt-get install -y python3-pandas python3-numpy 2>&1 | tail -5)

Bash(python3 -c "
import csv
with open\('/mnt/c/Users/asus/Desktop/OilRisk_Alert/data/Final_Oil_Dataset_Cleaned.csv'\) as f:
    headers = next\(csv.reader\(f\)\)
# Print index and column name for key columns
keywords = ['Brent原油期_收盘', 'VIX恐慌指数', '地缘政治事件综合评分', '俄乌冲突', '中东局势', '新闻情感指数', '美元指数_日频', 'T10YIE', 'Cushing', 'OPEC每月原油_OPEC石油输出', 'Baker_Hu', '情绪组_GPR', 'OVX', 'SP500_Close', 'EURUSD', 'Brent原油期_涨跌幅']
for kw in keywords:
    for i, h in enumerate\(headers\):
        if kw in h:
            print\(f'{i}: {h}'\)
            break
")
